storyInfo: Suzuran shares her new clues with everyone. While the group is still thinking, an angry mob illicitly surrounds Zwölftontechnik Strasse. The Mudrock Squad, also threatened by these people, began to dispatch their own forces into the town, and the situation continued to deteriorate.

attributes.content: Severin, I need everything you have on the Catastrophe Messenger named Biederman.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Biederman? Why?
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: An old man told me he saw Biederman leading the riot. He’s the one who destroyed the power plant.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: An old man? Is he a reliable source?
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: He called himself 'the last of the Winterwisps.'
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: He... He’s still alive? No. He might be a fraud.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: A man like that wouldn’t lie. It’s just my intuition, but I don’t think he would ever lie.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: This is his diary and his knife. I took them as keepsakes.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: But that means he must be...
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: I never expected this. I thought all his kind threw themselves into the lake.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: I’ll go see him. I... I don’t know. Should I go see him?
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: He told me the whole story. According to him, the Winterwisps weren’t behind this.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: And he had no hate for you. He spoke very calmly.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: I understand why, but the rioters do use the Winterwisp as an excuse for their looting.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: And it’s just that. An excuse.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Even if it’s an excuse, they committed crimes. Next, they’ll demand we throw open the granary and leave us to starve.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Besides, the Winterwisps have all mixed with the Wolumonders. At this point... *cough* *cough*...
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: No matter the excuse, we can’t trust them with our lives.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: We have a Catastrophe Messenger who should have died. Not only did he live, but he sparked a rebellion, and nobody even knew about it.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Putting it all together, it does seem likely that he was behind it.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Yes, it makes sense. If Biederman is indeed still alive, he is the one who could foment an uprising. And he knows Wolumonde is on the brink of famine.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: What about a motive?
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: ...The Great Rift.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: After the Catastrophe, people blamed him for the damage to the town.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: In a matter of months, we stopped at least seven acts of violence against him. There were more we weren’t even aware of.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: After that, he shut himself inside and refused to come out. Most days, he drank himself to violent outbursts. That is until Dr. Atro broke down the door of his house.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Sh-she broke it down?
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Dr. Atro reached out to Biederman after he hit rock bottom. From then on, he was usually there helping her with her work.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: It sounds like they got along?
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Sure, at least on the surface. That’s why I never suspected him. Biederman was always melancholic. And even when he worked with Dr. Atro, we never saw him smile.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: The more understanding townsfolk like myself tolerated him and his work. But he had enough of an excuse to seek vengeance on us.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Emotionally, he has a clear motivation. Not that that means anything.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Pretty much everyone has some reason or another to try to get back at someone.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Vengeance... it’s always vengeance.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: And before you get too comfortable with this, you did tell us Biederman was dead.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: You didn’t positively identify the bodies. So you missed this possibility.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: But you can’t just assume—*cough* *cough*—*hack* *hack*
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Are you okay?
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: —Just, a moment.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Why did it get all quiet out there?
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Schultz!
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: The townsfolk are on the move! They... they’ve gone to siege Zwölftontechnik Strasse!
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: What?! Get out there and stop them!
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: We don’t know who might be hiding in Zwölftontechnik Strasse. What if your 'Reunion' is holed up in there?
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: I- I tried. But they were too agitated. They wouldn’t listen to reason!
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: They learned about 'Reunion' from somewhere!
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: Grr... those excitable yokels!
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: There is a lot of movement in the town.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: And also... It looks like someone found their way here.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: They raised a militia and started combing a town... That means they’ve already decided to go to war.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: The townsfolk know we’re here. They want to burn us alive.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: ...Burn?
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Originium Arts are part of their normal schooling. Even their teamsters can do simple Arts. Starting a fire is easy enough for them.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: We can’t stay here. Will Rhodes Island lead the charge?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: I think... it’s just the angry people. They see us as villains, drenched in sin. They are the ones who want to drive us away.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: That’s all.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Mudrock.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Don’t forget our people died in this town.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: We respect your choice, but you're still young… and you don't yet understand the meaning behind this.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Just so you know, we’re not all that easily roused.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: If we fight, an entire city will come after us.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: If we run, they’ll brand us as arsonists, partisans, bandits. What’s the difference?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: The normal Sarkaz way is pretty simple: just destroy the town. Level it. Done.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: The only tricky part was the automatic Arts units. But their infighting already dealt with those.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Just give the order, and we’ll leave the moon to rest forever in the Winterwisp Mountains. Spring... will never come.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Winter... is long, this year.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Time to make up your mind, Mudrock.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Give us back our home! Out with the bandits! Out with the Infected!
attributes.name: Townsfolk

attributes.content: Weapons here! Men, come arm yourselves. Everyone with decent Arts!
attributes.name: Townsfolk

attributes.content: What’s happening? Why does it feel like they’re preparing for war?
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: That’s about right. It is a war.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: Woah! GreyThroat! Gimme a little warning next time!
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: At least, that’s what it is to them. They think they’re fighting a war.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: But why? Are the other operators okay?
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: I wouldn’t say okay. It seems like Severin didn’t want this to happen. Things are getting out of hand.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: Folinic says she found some clues. The man in this picture, one Biederman, is now one of our key suspects.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: Ayerscarpe is operating on his own. Remember this man. We just need to know where he is. He’s probably the one behind this insurgency.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: Find the bad guy! Got it!
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: What about Reunion?
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: They set themselves up in a small, abandoned hunting village. People go in and out every day, but the big one doesn’t move.
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: Oh, and while I was figuring out which way to go, I found a small group that seemed to be patrolling around the edge of the town.
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: It couldn’t be...?
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: Wh-what’s that?!
attributes.name: Townsfolk

attributes.content: A rock? A giant made out of stone? G-get some Arts on it! But not fire! Fire’s useless!
attributes.name: Townsfolk

attributes.content: Does anyone know any other Originium Arts?! Hurry. We have to stop it!
attributes.name: Townsfolk

attributes.content: It’s no use!
attributes.name: Townsfolk

attributes.content: You’re making fools of yourselves. They aren’t alive. They’re just a bunch of rocks cobbled together by some Arts.
attributes.name: Townsfolk

attributes.content: We need an artificer to get the 'Gramophone' back! Use it on that thing!
attributes.name: Townsfolk

attributes.content: You think you can get away with this?!
attributes.name: Rebellious Infected

attributes.content: Give it up! Open your eyes! You know why this is happening. You know what brought ruin to Wolumonde!
attributes.name: Rebellious Infected

attributes.content: It’s all you! Damned Winterwisps! Teaming up with Infected to steal the town!
attributes.name: Townsfolk

attributes.content: What a bunch of morons! Heads full of music and garbage art! Don’t you see this is the end of Wolumonde?!
attributes.name: Rebellious Infected

attributes.content: I know. But it would’ve ended quicker if we just handed it over to you.
attributes.name: Townsfolk

attributes.content: Has Severin ever told you how much food you have stored? Did he say when the town will get back on course? No! Never! There’s no hope!
attributes.name: Rebellious Infected

attributes.content: That’s your fault! You destroyed my home!
attributes.name: Townsfolk

attributes.content: Wrong! It’s you high and mighty nobles who pushed us to desperation!
attributes.name: Rebellious Townsfolk

attributes.content: And that’s why you’re killing people?!
attributes.name: Townsfolk

attributes.content: Folinic! We have to stop them!
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Now that we know who could be behind this, we shouldn’t be hurting each other like this.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Let’s go talk to them. We can convince them not to storm the town hall. They know Rhodes Island, so there should be a way.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Folinic...?
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Why... why are you stopping me?
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: If we don’t do something...
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: (Silently shakes her head)
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Folinic?
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: There is no room for argument or invective on the battlefield. Life passes quickly. Time is short.
Truly.
Neither side knows what to debate.
It is unclear why they went to war, why they give their lives in vain.
Indeed. Rather few hold on to any ideals after taking up arms.
But now, before my very eyes, they fight one another, not only with weapons, but also with words. They cast blame along with stones.
A rare sight.
Let’s go.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: I can tell. You’re still reluctant.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Reluctant...? When we came here, we only planned to... No. There’s no point. There hasn’t been, since we first set foot in Wolumonde.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: We lost four of our people in the fire. I’ve already stopped so many. But now, the other Infected must be given... perspective.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Otherwise, we will lose control. No. The rage, the longing, will go unsated. We may even turn back to the way we were...
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: If you hate Reunion so much, why did you join in the first place?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: I thought...
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Never mind.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: It’s time to fight.
attributes.name: Mudrock
